footer.companyDesc: Skytech Aviation is an authorized civil aircraft parts supplier and proud member of the Aviation Suppliers Association (ASA).

home.title: Skytech Aviation - Authorized Aircraft Parts Supplier
home.description: Your trusted partner for authentic civil aircraft parts and components. ASA member serving airlines worldwide.

hero.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner for Authentic Aviation Components

about.title: About Skytech Aviation
about.description: We are a certified aviation parts supplier specializing in authentic OEM components for civil aircraft. As proud members of the Aviation Suppliers Association (ASA), we maintain the highest standards of quality and reliability.

cta.title: Ready to Partner with Us?
cta.description: Join our growing network of satisfied distributors and airlines worldwide.

products.title: Aircraft Parts & Components
products.description: Browse our extensive catalog of certified aircraft parts and components for all major aircraft types.
products.subtitle: Premium Quality Aviation Components

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Comprehensive aviation parts and support services tailored to your specific needs.
services.subtitle: Full-Spectrum Aviation Support

sourcing.title: Parts Sourcing & Procurement
sourcing.description: Expert sourcing of hard-to-find parts from trusted suppliers worldwide
sourcing.details: Our extensive network enables us to locate and procure rare and obsolete parts quickly and efficiently.

technical.title: Technical Support
technical.description: Expert guidance on part selection, compatibility, and installation
technical.details: Our certified technicians provide comprehensive support to ensure you get the right parts for your aircraft.

aog.title: AOG Support
aog.description: 24/7 aircraft on ground emergency support to minimize downtime
aog.details: When every minute counts, our AOG team works around the clock to get your aircraft back in service.

logistics.title: Logistics & Delivery
logistics.description: Fast, secure worldwide shipping and customs handling
logistics.details: We handle all aspects of logistics to ensure your parts arrive safely and on time.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.description: Rigorous inspection and certification of all parts
quality.details: Every part undergoes thorough quality checks to ensure it meets aviation standards.

documentation.title: Documentation Support
documentation.details: We provide all necessary paperwork for regulatory compliance and traceability.

about.title: About Skytech Aviation
about.description: Learn about our commitment to excellence in aviation parts supply and distribution.
about.subtitle: Excellence Since 2015

intro.title: Who We Are
intro.text: Skytech Aviation is a leading provider of authentic OEM aircraft parts and components, serving airlines, MROs, and distributors across the globe. As proud members of the Aviation Suppliers Association (ASA), we uphold the highest standards of quality, safety, and customer service.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To provide the aviation industry with authentic, certified aircraft parts while delivering exceptional service and building long-term partnerships based on trust and reliability.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be the most trusted and preferred aviation parts supplier in the Middle East and Africa, recognized for our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: Never compromise on the authenticity and quality of parts

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Honest, transparent business practices in all dealings

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: Consistent delivery on promises and commitments

team.title: Leadership Team
team.description: Meet the experts behind Skytech Aviation

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with our team for inquiries, quotes, or support.
contact.subtitle: We're Here to Help
